title: Brand_ON
author: Brand_ON
created_time: August 25, 2023, 03:12:05 PMLast edit: October 15, 2023, 06:55:50 AM by Brand_ON
content: Promotion. Reputation Management. Posting (Activity).‚úÖ We will conduct an audit of your company's presence and reputationWe will find out where there is already information about you and what is being written about you in reviews. We will also determine where it is necessary to create a company page (directories, forums, rankings, review sites, etc.).‚úÖ Attract the attention of potential clients and investorsWe will attract attention and generate interest in the company and its services, which in turn will impact conversion rate improvement.‚úÖ Organize the top search engine resultsWe will remove or push down negative reviews and websites that appear in the top search engine results.‚úÖ Write appropriate reviews for reinforcement or image enhancementWe write appropriate reviews about potentially real situations.‚úÖ Engage in posting (activity) to the necessary extentPosting (activity) on forums will keep the thread at the top. Posting on review sites will update old reviews.‚≠êÔ∏è Maintain account managementSkillful handling of accounts (details discussed in personal communication).‚≠êÔ∏è We specialize in:-------------------------------‚ö°Reputation Audit‚ö°SERM - Search Engine Reputation Management‚ö°ORM - Online Reputation Management‚ö°HM - Hidden Marketing‚ö°Press Release - Creation and Placement‚ö°Native Advertising - Creation and Placement‚ö°Targeted Advertising - Setup and Management (Service temporarily unavailable)‚ö°Contextual Advertising - Setup and Management (Service temporarily unavailable)‚ö°Banner Advertising - Creation and Placement‚ö°Social Media Management - Youtube, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Telegram, and others‚ö°Email Marketing‚ö°UI/UX Design (coming soon)Our Services Aim - to attract the attention of potential clients and investors. To establish and maintain understanding between the company and its clients, both existing and potential. Also, to enhance the loyalty of the target audience. We will tell people about you and show why they should choose you. We will effectively highlight the company's advantages.We have experience in the following areas:Financial Market (banks, Forex brokers, crypto exchanges, regulators, money exchangers, payment systems);Financial Projects (investment projects, HYIP projects, ICOs, online games, casinos).And many other fields of activity.We have experience working in UKR, RUS, ENG, ESP, IDN, and other languages.-------------Contacts:Website: http://en.brand-up.topTelegram: @Brand_UP

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: I like it, more like a fancy shilling company. Ps, this board is not for such services, here you can move your topic by looking at bottom left of your page.Move it here for better exposure, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=84.0Link above is a den of people in need of your services.üòâ

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: You talked about QuoteSERM - Search Engine Reputation Management‚ö°ORM - Online Reputation ManagementAnd yet look you can't even configure your site Code:http://en.brand-up.top/ to make it secure you can get a free SSL on https://letsencrypt.org/This is what shows on my browser

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on August 25, 2023, 03:12:05 PM‚úÖ Organize the top search engine resultsWe will remove or push down negative reviews and websites that appear in the top search engine results.Is this service legal, or is there a legal company that will think about it? Negative reviews are part of any activity, as it is rare to find work that deserves 5/5 if you ask 100,000 people about it. these negative reviews are evidence of the quality of the platform if it is resolved professionally or It wasn't fraud related. I would be wary of platform with 100% positive rating over 95%.You are offering a promotion service and your UI/UX design is still incomplete, it is a bad way to introduce yourself and your activity.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on August 27, 2023, 02:30:00 PMAnd yet look you can't even configure your site Code:http://en.brand-up.top/ to make it secure you can get a free SSL on https://letsencrypt.org/This is what shows on my browserMy browser says that this site is offline, with or without an SSL certificate. Directly or through the subdomain presented by the OP here, same thing. Domain with hyphen and .top extension, I have to admit, is a desperate choice of domain. I am really interested in how this site will be SEO optimized and its rank in a few months.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on August 28, 2023, 05:45:19 PMQuote from: Brand_ON on August 25, 2023, 03:12:05 PM‚úÖ Organize the top search engine resultsWe will remove or push down negative reviews and websites that appear in the top search engine results.Is this service legal, or is there a legal company that will think about it? Negative reviews are part of any activity, as it is rare to find work that deserves 5/5 if you ask 100,000 people about it. these negative reviews are evidence of the quality of the platform if it is resolved professionally or It wasn't fraud related. I would be wary of platform with 100% positive rating over 95%.You are offering a promotion service and your UI/UX design is still incomplete, it is a bad way to introduce yourself and your activity.The seller is also offering HYIP services which we all know are noting but a way to scam the investors. If you closely read the quoted text then it's also confirmed that the user is doing some kind of shady tricks in order to suppress the negative reviews of a site in order to make it look more legitimate. All such kind of things are done for the purpose that's not decent because if the negative reviews are suppressed then it would be very difficult for the customers to know that either the platform is trusted or something that could cause them huge losses if they trust it with their money.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 28, 2023, 06:27:29 PMQuote from: coin-investor on August 27, 2023, 02:30:00 PMAnd yet look you can't even configure your site Code:http://en.brand-up.top/ to make it secure you can get a free SSL on https://letsencrypt.org/This is what shows on my browserMy browser says that this site is offline, with or without an SSL certificate. Directly or through the subdomain presented by the OP here, same thing. Domain with hyphen and .top extension, I have to admit, is a desperate choice of domain. I am really interested in how this site will be SEO optimized and its rank in a few months.The main domain is online only the subdomain is offline I use this link to access the site http://brand-up.top/ not good on any site that is not encrypted You cannot trust a site that has no security certificate when you're interacting, based on Whois they are an old domain that they likely purchase so they can say that they have existed for 7 years already based on their homepage a very old trick by providers to gain credibility.https://www.whois.com/whois/brand-up.topDomain:brand-up.topRegistrar:URL Solutions Inc.Registered On:2016-03-04Expires On:2024-03-04Updated On:2023-01-18All their social media are new especially Twitter with only 1 follower this project is such a big joke

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on August 29, 2023, 04:16:04 PMThe seller is also offering HYIP services which we all know are noting but a way to scam the investors. If you closely read the quoted text then it's also confirmed that the user is doing some kind of shady tricks in order to suppress the negative reviews of a site in order to make it look more legitimate. Yes, and it is stupid. The fact that the service does not have any negative reviews is an additional reason to raise doubts, especially if it is new. I am surprised how it will erase data such as the topics in this forum. The best thing to do is to show negative results late, but the service that searches for such things is often a fraud.Given the user's lack of response and UX details, I think it's a scam and the user doesn't know what he's saying.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on August 25, 2023, 03:12:05 PMWe have experience in the following areas:Financial Market (banks, Forex brokers, crypto exchanges, regulators, money exchangers, payment systems);Financial Projects (investment projects, HYIP projects, ICOs, online games, casinos).And many other fields of activity.We have experience working in UKR, RUS, ENG, ESP, IDN, and other languages.-------------Going through the website, I was hoping to see some portfolio of jobs done but in going through the website, I saw a very high profile and I was expecting to see loads of certification of completions. The .top domain name doesn't also sit well with me, I did expect a .com domain name considering the services you offer, it is percieved that you should have known the right domain name to go with such brands.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: you say that you are a platform that helps to build reputation for other companies, but you alone cannot build a reputation for your platform. i'm sorry to say that but your domain alone doesn't convince other people to believe that you can build a reputation for them, in fact it's sometimes inaccessible and the interface is so simple it looks like it was designed by a middle school kid.before launching a reputation management service like this you should be able to build the image of your own brand, so that people will believe that the services you offer are truly competent in this field and can be trusted by people. if that's all there is to it, it's quite skeptical that people will use your services.

comments.author: Brand_ON
comments.body: Hello, earlier I wasn't responding as actively in the thread. Wow. I'll reply to everyone now.digaran, thank you for the clarification; I've moved this branch.coin-investor, previously we attempted to implement SSL, but it caused issues on the Cloudflare side, resulting in improper website display. Since we don't accept any payments on our site and don't request any data, except for email and name in the case of using the contact form, you can even use temporary email if needed. So, it was decided to leave everything as is. Our website serves as a kind of business card.Yamane_Keto, we don't delete negative reviews; they remain. However, we assist in resolving online negativity when someone made a mistake and received many reviews about it. But once the mistake is corrected, it's challenging to start over, and that's where we help smooth out past negativity and communicate that it's in the past. Everyone makes mistakes, and some deserve a second chance.examplens, when we selected the website name, only this domain was available for our idea. But does it matter significantly for a business card?SamReomo, yes, we have experience with HYIP projects. However, we don't claim them to be risk-free. We help disseminate information about the project and inform if it's currently making payments. If the project stops paying, we take action. Many people are interested in such projects, despite understanding that they are not permanent.robelneo, our website recently stopped working for a few days. Perhaps you are referring to that. It was related to our website's use of Cloudflare. The hosting changed IP, and this had to be updated on Cloudflare, which we didn't notice right away. Indeed, our website has been up for 7 years, and I can't fathom how any trick could have been involved. Previously, our website had a different appearance; it was just a contact page. Later, the site expanded.Yamane_Keto, we haven't received many reviews, so there haven't been many negative ones. Most of our clients are satisfied. There were a few clients who had higher expectations from our services, but we didn't work with them for long because we couldn't provide what they were asking for. We informed them right away, but they didn't want to hear it, so we terminated the collaboration. Some of these were HYIP projects, and I'm glad they didn't leave a review because it wouldn't have reflected the truth.wallet4bitcoin, no one wanted us to include them in our portfolio. There are a few minor cases of our work, but they are outdated, and you won't be able to verify their authenticity.moneystery, you're correct. We understand that, and many have pointed that out. But wouldn't it be deceptive? On one hand, we haven't created an online reputation for ourselves, but we claim to do it for others. On the other hand, when we do create that reputation, we'll be accused of deceiving by making a false reputation. However, after considering all pros and cons, we've decided that starting to create a reputation for ourselves will bring more benefits than drawbacks. We've seen some companies create fake case studies, advertise well, but provide poor services. With us, it's the opposite ‚Äì we deliver good work but haven't created a fancy image of ourselves.I'll write a few more words about what everyone is asking.Yes, our social media presence is limited. At some point, we considered using them but later found some of them to be irrelevant or not to our liking. Currently, we've decided not to maintain social media profiles as it's not a priority for us. We're also considering a website design update. If we do that, we'll keep only those social media accounts that are actively used and update the list of our services. If we keep the current design, we'll still remove the inactive social media profiles. We'll also optimize the website for mobile viewing.Most of our clients come through recommendations. We're a small company and can't take on many clients simultaneously. At most, we've had up to 4 clients at once.We're based in Ukraine, and the war in our country has had some impact on us and our clients. Due to the war, we lost some clients, and our business is not doing as well as before.If you need our services but have doubts about us, we suggest starting small, gradually delegating some tasks to us and seeing how we work.Our most extensive experience is with Forex brokers, mining services, exchanges, and wallets. Overall, our experience mostly revolves around financial projects. However, we have experience in other areas too. Just ask us, tell us what interests you, and we'll respond whether we can help.Just give us a chance to be useful to you and prove our competence.I thank everyone for their advice! We'll take it into consideration!

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on October 15, 2023, 08:29:51 AMcoin-investor, previously we attempted to implement SSL, but it caused issues on the Cloudflare side, resulting in improper website display. Since we don't accept any payments on our site and don't request any data, except for email and name in the case of using the contact form, you can even use temporary email if needed. So, it was decided to leave everything as is. Our website serves as a kind of business card.How about those who will visit your site for the first time, they will leave you right away if they see that you're site is not secure, it is industry standard that you make your site secured for your visitors and clients, you should find a way to fix, you are not the only site that uses cloudflare so why not fix it.Its not good for your reputation if there are request to fix your site and yet you ignore it, even if you're not asking for payment, you have to follow the norm of setting up a site if a simple blog can do it then why cannot, if you cannot do that you can ask help from Cloudflare support.

comments.author: Brand_ON
comments.body: coin-investor, thank you for your care. In fact, I have already started working on this issue at the moment. I think everything will be okay soon. It may be necessary to switch from Cloudflare to a certificate.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on October 15, 2023, 10:46:53 AMcoin-investor, thank you for your care. In fact, I have already started working on this issue at the moment. I think everything will be okay soon. It may be necessary to switch from Cloudflare to a certificate.Almost every reliable hosting service offers a free SSL certificate. I find it a little strange that you claim the problems caused by the Cloudflare certificate, at least as far as I've used it, one of the simpler things to set up.Honestly, since you offer services related to HYIP scams, any warning when visiting your service is useful.btw. the site is currently offline

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on October 15, 2023, 08:29:51 AMHello, earlier I wasn't responding as actively in the thread. Wow. I'll reply to everyone now.robelneo, our website recently stopped working for a few days. Perhaps you are referring to that. It was related to our website's use of Cloudflare. The hosting changed IP, and this had to be updated on Cloudflare, which we didn't notice right away. Indeed, our website has been up for 7 years, and I can't fathom how any trick could have been involved. Previously, our website had a different appearance; it was just a contact page. Later, the site expanded.The site is still unsecured do you think people who use an AV will still continue to proceed and check the site if they see something like this, you will lose potential clients, traffic and your site will continue to get flagged, why not do away Cloudflare for now until you fix the site so that it will resolve where you are using a Cloudflare, I have no problem with Cloudflare but as a webmaster, you cannot have a live site with an unsecured setup.

comments.author: Brand_ON
comments.body: coin-investor, the website has now received a free certificate from the hosting provider. I also don't understand why installing a certificate from Cloudflare is causing issues. I thought maybe I was doing something wrong. The hosting provider's staff suggested installing the certificate without leaving Cloudflare to make sure the problem persisted. They encountered an error as well. So, I decided to switch from Cloudflare in favor of the certificate. Perhaps, in reality, Cloudflare was unnecessary for us If you visited our website and it wasn't working, it was due to the configuration, but it only took a few minutes to resolve.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on October 15, 2023, 08:29:51 AMYamane_Keto, we don't delete negative reviews; they remain. However, we assist in resolving online negativity when someone made a mistake and received many reviews about it. But once the mistake is corrected, it's challenging to start over, and that's where we help smooth out past negativity and communicate that it's in the past. Everyone makes mistakes, and some deserve a second chance.This is different from the service description. In the service description, you mentioned deleting or pushing down negative reviews, not solving problems. Also, solving problems is the responsibility of the support team, and some negative reviews will not change, so you cannot interfere in it, and some negative reviews are better than not having them at all. .Quote‚úÖ Organize the top search engine resultsWe will remove or push down negative reviews and websites that appear in the top search engine results.

comments.author: Brand_ON
comments.body: Yamane_Keto, this is not about physical removal, but displacement from the top search results. In other words, the negative review will still be available for viewing but will no longer be at the top; it will be pushed far down. By doing so, it effectively disappears from the top results (gets deleted).Sometimes, a website may not allow us to overshadow a negative review with positive content. In such cases, we work to at least lower the website's ranking, ideally pushing it down to the next page of search results.Physically removing the negativity is financially costly and not worth the effort and expenses. Although we have had some experience with physically removing negative reviews in our practice. To achieve this, we invested a lot of effort and engaged in lengthy negotiations. It is a significant achievement if it can be done with minimal expenses. We managed to do it, but we cannot promise the same success for others.

comments.author: Brand_ON
comments.body: For the first time in a long while, you can take advantage of our services again.Please note that spaces are limited.If you have reputation issues or there is no information about you on the internet, we can work on resolving this situation.We have experience in various fields (finance, real estate, medicine, etc.).If you are unsure whether you need our services, please write to us, and we will conduct research and provide you with information and our conclusions regarding the need for such work.Contact us here: http://en.brand-up.top/contacts/

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Brand_ON on July 20, 2024, 04:01:00 PMIf you have reputation issues or there is no information about you on the internet, we can work on resolving this situation.We have experience in various fields (finance, real estate, medicine, etc.).If you are unsure whether you need our services, please write to us, and we will conduct research and provide you with information and our conclusions regarding the need for such work.Contact us here: http://en.brand-up.top/contacts/Interesting, but I can't find anything about you or your reputation. Isn't it logical that you apply your strategy for your own brand, that could be an excellent example. Or is this current state the maximum of your service that you offer?btw. terrible choice of domain
